name: places/ChIJkT32oFZYwokRQdy0426bYEc
formattedAddress: 287A Broome St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 287A Broome St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text:
At first, I was impressed at the speed and efficiency with which the team answered my questions about their package delivery service.  Because of that, I decided to sign up for a one time delivery of something extremely important related to my late father's pension.

All was great, until after I emailed the team with a routine question.  To my surprise, I was suddenly told that both their Manhattan stores were closing in the next few weeks!  If I hadn't gotten in touch with them about something else, I would have had my package sent to a closed office.

The team insisted that they had emailed all of their customers of the closures, but I did not receive anything-not even in my spam folder.  Furthermore, up until yesterday, my account with their website still shows several package receiving options-including monthly ones-to places that will no longer exist in a few week's time!

To add insult to injury, I emailed both of the owners of the company to express my displeasure with these developments.  However, five days later, I have not gotten the courtesy of even a form letter response...

Update:

A comment about excellent service was written several months ago by "Andrea Friedman"-the same woman who owns the company! How appropriate is that?

originalText.text: If you are looking for a safe space to leave your luggage while touring NYC, I highly recommend City CoPilot! We used the Times Square and Lower Manhattan locations... both were great! Shout out to Maggie for being amazing. Great company!

text.text: If you are looking for a safe space to leave your luggage while touring NYC, I highly recommend City CoPilot! We used the Times Square and Lower Manhattan locations... both were great! Shout out to Maggie for being amazing. Great company!

originalText.text: Very good location, only five minutes walk to subway station, it also very easy and secure to store your luggage. Price is 10 dollar per luggage and they give us free of charge for car seats. A good plus is they do have restrooms inside

text.text: Very good location, only five minutes walk to subway station, it also very easy and secure to store your luggage. Price is 10 dollar per luggage and they give us free of charge for car seats. A good plus is they do have restrooms inside

originalText.text: Although the service is convenient and the pricing is great, we were missing several items including my daughter's  passport when we picked up our bags.  I spoke to the gentleman behind the desk and he showed no concern and told me he hadn't seen my missing items. He didn't even bother to go to the back to see if maybe they had fallen out. I would rather drag my luggage all over the city than to store my things there again.

text.text: Although the service is convenient and the pricing is great, we were missing several items including my daughter's  passport when we picked up our bags.  I spoke to the gentleman behind the desk and he showed no concern and told me he hadn't seen my missing items. He didn't even bother to go to the back to see if maybe they had fallen out. I would rather drag my luggage all over the city than to store my things there again.

originalText.text:
To make a long story short, I checked out from my airbnb early to store my luggage elsewhere so I can hang out with my friend before I leave the city that evening. However that place was closed and after I struggled to find another place, I found City CoPilot. I paid my fee online, went to the desk inside this visitor center (tourist trap lol, not my thing but I was willing to do anything to store my bag somewhere) and was greeted by a friendly staff member who checked me in and took my bag and stored it to pick it up at a later time that evening.

The service was excellent from start to finish, my bag was in the same condition after I picked it up and I highly recommend City CoPilot to anyone that needs to leave their bag while they’re enjoying this beautiful city.
